translation.en: Hey, be careful. I had to sell a lot of books to get that.
translation.ko: 거 조심 좀 하지 그게 책 몇 권 값인 줄 알아?

translation.en: -[groans] -And why did you need to bring a tanning bed to a tropical island?
translation.ko: 도대체 왜 열대 섬에 오면서 태닝 기계까지 챙겨 온 거예요?

translation.en: [Clutch] Uh, for tanning.
[Clutch] Hey!
What is it? What's wrong?
Nothing. My arm's sore.
I've been chopping vines all morning.
Dwayne, get over here! Time to earn your pay.
translation.ko: 드웨인! 이리 와 봐 월급 값 해야지

translation.en: Huh? Uh, you don't actually pay me, Professor Powers.
translation.ko: 네? 전 월급 받은 적 없는데요, 교수님

translation.en: I'm an intern.
I pay you in knowledge, Dwayne. And this is where you learn how to chop.
translation.ko: 내 가르침은 돈보다 더 귀하거든? 이번엔 칼질하는 걸 배울 때야

translation.en: So, chop-chop.
translation.ko: 내 가르침은 돈보다 더 귀하거든? 이번엔 칼질하는 걸 배울 때야 자, 휘둘러

translation.en: Hey! Hey! I need that!
Oh, great. So much for my perfect tan.
translation.ko: 이런, 태닝 한번 하기 진짜 힘들군

translation.en: It's a totem pole.
But who do you suppose carved it?
Is it dangerous?
-Oh. -No, Dwayne.
It's a hunk of rock. It's not alive.
translation.ko: 그냥 돌기둥이야 살아 있는 게 아니라고

translation.en: [Master Wu] "Uncharted."
[Pixal] Have you been up all night?
Yeah, just monitoring surveillance footage for any sign of the criminals
translation.ko: 응, 지난달에 크립타리움을 탈옥한 범죄자들을 추적하려고

translation.en: who broke out of Kryptarium last month.
I was told the police made an arrest.
[Lloyd] Fugi-Dove.
They caught him feeding pigeons in the park.
Is that Ronin?
translation.ko: 공원에서 비둘기한테 먹이를 주다가 잡혔대 로닌 아저씨네?

translation.en: Yeah, the police hired him to help round up the criminals.
translation.ko: 맞아, 경찰이 범죄자 검거를 도와달라고 했대

translation.en: I don't like how the police keep using a Bounty Hunter like Ronin but...
translation.ko: 로닌 아저씨 같은 현상금 사냥꾼을 끌어들이는 건 싫은데

translation.en: Who is that?
Cecil Putnam, manager of the Explorer's Club.
translation.ko: 세실 퍼트남이라고 하네 탐험가 클럽의 협회장이지

translation.en: I regret to inform you that
Misako Montgomery Garmadon's membership has been cancelled.
translation.ko: 오늘 이 시간부터 마사코 몽고메리 가마돈 씨의

translation.en: Effective immediately.
Here are items emptied from her club locker.
On what grounds?
I'm afraid it's club policy.
Whenever a member is missing and presumed lost at sea,
translation.ko: 회원이 행방불명됐거나 조난을 당한 거로 여겨질 땐

translation.en: the club revokes their membership.
What are you talking about?
Oh, there's no need for panic.
Her position will be given to another worthy applicant.
translation.ko: 마사코 씨의 빈자리는 다른 회원으로 채워지니까

translation.en: The club will prevail.
I'm not worried about the club!
I'm worried about my mother and Master Wu! Where are they?
translation.ko: 엄마랑 사부님 걱정이죠 두 분은 어디 가셨어요?

translation.en: She was leading an expedition with Professor Powers
to attempt to navigate the storm belt
and prove her theory about an uncharted island.
translation.ko: 미지의 섬이 있다는 이론을 증명할 계획이었거든

translation.en: But as we haven't heard from them in several weeks,
translation.ko: 그런데 벌써 몇 주째 연락이 오지 않았어

translation.en: the expedition is presumed lost.
The storm belt? What was she thinking?
[Pixal] The storm belt is an area off the southern coast plagued by violent storms.
translation.ko: 그 지역은 거센 폭풍 때문에 늘 골치가 아픈 곳이라고

translation.en: Numerous ships and airplanes have gone missing in the region.
translation.ko: 사라진 선박이나 비행기가 셀 수 없을 정도로 많지

translation.en: It is considered very dangerous.
To my knowledge, there is only one person
translation.ko: 내가 알기론 저기서 살아서 돌아온 사람은 지금까지 한 명뿐이었어

translation.en: ever to have emerged from the storm belt.
translation.ko: 저기서 살아서 돌아온 사람은 지금까지 한 명뿐이었어

translation.en: Correct. A man named Timothy Batterson.
Batterson was part of a balloon tour which was blown off course.
translation.ko: 이자가 탄 열기구가 경로를 이탈한 적이 있었대

translation.en: He claims it was blown into the storm belt
and eventually crashed on an uncharted island.
Pixal, ready the Bounty.
Zane, pull up whatever information you have on this man.
translation.ko: 쟌 형, 저자에 관한 모든 정보를 모아줘

translation.en: The rest of you, pack. We don't have a moment to lose.
translation.ko: 다른 팀원들은 짐 싸 꾸물댈 시간이 없어

translation.en: Hiya, fellas. What'll it be? Leaded or unleaded?
translation.ko: 어서 옵쇼, 뭐로 넣어드릴까? 일반 아니면 고급?

translation.en: Are you Mister Batterson?
But nobody calls me that.
translation.ko: 맞긴 한데 아무도 그렇게 딱딱하게 안 불러

translation.en: Oh, what do they call you?
Twitchy Tim. Twitchy for short.
Well, um... Twitchy, my mother was part of an expedition
translation.ko: 네, 트위치 제 어머니가 남부 해안에 있다는

translation.en: to try and map an unknown island off the southern coast, and she's missing.
translation.ko: 미지의 섬을 찾아 떠나셨다가 행방불명이 되셨어요

translation.en: We're going after them.
You're the only one who knows what's out there
and we could really use your help.
I'll tell you what's out there!
Storms! Monsters! Doom!
I was struck twelve times by lightning
trying to escape that nightmare.
And you want me to go back?
Twelve? Really?
[shivers] Yeah.
Twelve, luckily, it didn't affect me but I...
translation.ko: 그래, 열두 번 다행히 살아남기는 했어 하지만...

translation.en: Hiya, fellas. What'll it be? Leaded or unleaded?
translation.ko: 어서 옵쇼, 뭐로 넣어드릴까? 일반 아니면 고급?

translation.en: -You already asked us that. -I did?
We're not here for gas.
translation.ko: 우린 기름 넣으러 온 거 아니에요

translation.en: We're here for your help. Remember?
translation.ko: 도움이 필요해서 왔죠 기억 안 나요?

translation.en: Yeah, we were talking about the uncharted island.
translation.ko: 네, 미지의 섬 얘기를 하고 있었잖아요

translation.en: We were asking you to come with us.
The uncharted island?
Are you nuts?
You want me to go back?
Well, you can forget it, the answer's...
translation.ko: 아니, 그건 꿈도 꾸지 마! 어차피...

translation.en: Hiya, fellas. What'll it be? Leaded or unleaded?
translation.ko: 어서 옵쇼, 뭐로 넣어드릴까? 일반 아니면 고급?

translation.en: What is going on? You said that twice!
translation.ko: 지금 뭐 하자는 거죠? 이미 두 번이나 물었잖아요!

translation.en: I did?
We were talking about
translation.ko: 우리랑 섬에 같이 가 달라고 얘기했잖아요

translation.en: going back to the island, remember?
translation.ko: 우리랑 섬에 같이 가 달라고 얘기했잖아요 기억 안 나요?

translation.en: We were asking you for help.
Going back to the island?
I swore I'd never do it
but what can I say a deals a deal.
translation.ko: 거기 다시는 안 가려고 했는데 에이, 모르겠다 약속한 거면 지켜야지

translation.en: You're driving, right?
Yes!
Interesting. Our radar is unable
to penetrate the fog bank.
translation.ko: 안개가 너무 짙어서 레이더도 뚫질 못해

translation.en: It's the island.
She doesn't want you to see her secrets.
translation.ko: 자신의 비밀을 아무한테도 들키기 싫은 거지

translation.en: How did you reach the island the first time?
It was a freak accident.
[Twitchy] I was taking a hot-air balloon tour.
But the balloon blew off course.
It got caught in a storm.
I tried to ride it out.
Felt like hours, days, being tossed around in that fog,
translation.ko: 그렇게 수십 시간 아니, 수십 일을 그 안개 속에서 뱅글뱅글 돌았지

translation.en: then suddenly... [grunts]
-Then what? -Lightning struck it. It crashed.
translation.ko: - 갑자기 뭐요? - 열기구가 번개에 맞았고 추락했지

translation.en: I must have blacked out
'cause I don't remember that part,
but when I woke up...
translation.ko: 기억이 전혀 안 나거든 나중에 정신이 들었을 때는 해변이더라고

translation.en: I was on a beach.
A blue sand beach.
Blue sand?
You must have hit your head pretty hard.
It was blue, I tell ya!
What do you think, I'm lying?
I'm telling the truth, ah...
Lloyd, I am picking up a rise in electro-static levels.
translation.ko: 로이드, 정전기 반응 강도가 높아지고 있어

translation.en: I do not think it would be wise to proceed any nearer.
I suggest you lower the catamarans and approach by sea.
translation.ko: 그보단 요트를 띄워서 바닷길로 가는 게 나을 거야

translation.en: Right let mount up and break some waves.
translation.ko: 좋아, 지금부턴 직접 파도와 부딪치는 거야

translation.en: Uh, he's going to need a life jacket.
Deploying water vessels in three, two, one...
Pix, we're down.
Proceeding into the fog bank.
[Pixal] Good luck, Lloyd. Be careful.
Why is it so quiet?
Why are you whispering?
I don't know.
Do you guys hear that?
-[waves crashing] -Waves. We must be getting close.
-Close to what? -[thunder rumbles]
-Look out! -Hard to port!
Here we go...
Hold on!
[Lloyd] Watch out for the Lightning!
[Zane] Fascinating. The rock seems to attract the lightning.
translation.ko: 놀라운데? 번개가 바위 쪽으로 몰리고 있어

translation.en: Nya, we're too wide! We won't fit!
[Jay] Here we go!
[Cole] Push the button!
We're too wide!
I am pushing the button! It's not working!
translation.ko: 안 그래도 누르고 있는데 작동이 안 돼

translation.en: Everyone, get to starboard!
Lean back in to the catamaran up on its side.
translation.ko: 선체를 기울여서 배가 옆으로 지나가게 하자

translation.en: What was I thinking offering to come back here?
translation.ko: 내가 정신이 나갔지 왜 여길 다시 온 거냐고

translation.en: I guess we're walking from here.
Maybe not. Pixal, do you copy?
translation.ko: 안 그래도 돼 픽셀, 내 말 들려?

translation.en: [Pixal] I copy, Lloyd.
We're on the island.
Can you fix on my location and deploy the Jungle Choppers?
translation.ko: 우리가 있는 위치를 확인해서 정글 바이크를 보내줄래?

translation.en: Affirmative. Deploying now.
That's what I call air-mail.
Mom!? Hello?
Look, that rock formation, it spells out help.
translation.ko: 얘들아 바위가 모여 있는 게 구조 신호 같은데?

translation.en: What Happened here?
They must have left this behind in case someone came after them.
translation.ko: 누군가 찾아올 걸 생각하고 두 분이 남겨놓은 것 같아

translation.en: Mom!
Master Wu? [echoing]
Are you nuts!?
You want those things to know we're here?
translation.ko: 그것들이 우리가 온 걸 알면 어쩌려고 그래!

translation.en: Uh, what things?
The monsters in the jungle!
They look like statues!
translation.ko: 생긴 건 꼭 조각상 같지만 그건 다...

translation.en: But it's a trick.
translation.ko: 생긴 건 꼭 조각상 같지만 그건 다... 함정이지

translation.en: They're alive.
Well, what are we waiting for?
